name: Mangual
description:
Swing and rotate your mighty flail to destroy the undead!

Controls: 

  • W,A,S,D to move.
  • Mouse  swings the weapon.

This game was made for the Kenney Jam 2021

Developed by @pabloarev and @doblekaos14

You can download the game version originally uploaded for the jam or play the latest version in browser.
